mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.BLOG_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.HIT, A.IP, A.CREATE_DATE, A.MODIFY_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BLOG_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, BLOG_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, IP, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM BLOG) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOG (BLOG_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, IP, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (BLOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{ip}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
